SA15ratksanu:1: (77.4) vyatirekātmikā vyāptir ākṣiptānvayarūpiṇī / vaidharmyavati dṛṣṭānte sattvahetor ihocyate /
SA15ratksanu:4: santaś cāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:9: (77.11) yasya kramākramau na vidyete na tasyārthakriyāsāmarthyam /
SA15ratksanu:11: na vidyete cākṣaṇikasya kramākramāv iti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:18: abhede hi prathama eva kṣaṇe śaktatvād /
SA15ratksanu:19: bhāvino 'pi kāryasya karaṇaprasaṅge kathaṃ kāryāntarakaraṇe kramāntarāvakāśaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:25: (77.20) tad ayam akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramābhāvalakṣaṇo hetur nāsiddho vaktavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:30: yenaiva hi pratyakṣātmanā pramāṇenāparaprakārābhāvād vidhibhūtābhyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ vidhibhūtasyārthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptiḥ prasādhitā,
SA15ratksanu:32: na hi dahanādinā dhūmāder vyāptisādhakapramāṇād aparaṃ dhūmādyabhāvena dahanādyabhāvasya vyāptisādhakaṃ kiñcit pramāṇaṃ śaraṇabhūtam asti /
SA15ratksanu:33_0: tasmād vidhyor eva vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇam abhāvayor api vyāptisādhakam iti nyāyasya
SA15ratksanu:33_1: duratikramatvāt sattvābhāvena kramākramābhāvo vyāpta eveti nānaikāntika ity anavadyo
SA15ratksanu:34: tad ayam akṣaṇikād vinivartamāṇaḥ svavyāpyaṃ sattvaṃ nivartya kṣaṇike viśrāmayatīti sattvahetoḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy anavadyā. /
SA15ratksanu:36: nanu vyāpakānupalambhataḥ sattvasya kathaṃ svasādhyapratibandhasiddhiḥ, asyāpy anekadoṣaduṣṭatvāt /
SA15ratksanu:37: tathā hi na tāvad ayaṃ prasaṅga hetuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:42: pratītir hi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
SA15ratksanu:44: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ vyāpakānupalambhaś ca svarūpāsiddhaḥ syāt /
SA15ratksanu:46: (79.4) antimapakṣe tu na kaścid dhetur anāśrayaḥ syāt /
SA15ratksanu:55: (79.9) tṛītye tu na sarvadā 'kṣaṇikasattāniṣedhaḥ / tadarpitasaṃskārābhāve tat smaraṇāyogāt /
SA15ratksanu:57: (79.11) pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvad pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15ratksanu:58: akṣaṇikātmanaḥ sarvadaiva tvanmate 'pratyakṣatvāt na cānumānatas tadabhāvas tatpratibaddhaliṅgān upalam bhādityāśrayāsiddhis tāvad uddhatā /
SA15ratksanu:63: tathā hi kramisahakāryapekṣayā kramikāryakāritvan tāvad aviruddham /
SA15ratksanu:67: na ca tayor āvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyān tadvataḥ kā cit kṣatiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:73: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaram,
SA15ratksanu:74: tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvopapatter aśakyaṃ bhāvānām pratikṣaṇam anyonyatvam upapādayitum iti /
SA15ratksanu:77: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryād iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:78: (79.26) tad idaṃ mātā me vandhyety ādivat svavacanavirodhād ayuktam /
SA15ratksanu:79: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa katham ādau tat kāryaṃ kuryāt /
SA15ratksanu:81: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
SA15ratksanu:83: nanv ayam akṣaṇikaḥ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati /
SA15ratksanu:84: tac cāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣiva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe sad iti tadāpi janayet /
SA15ratksanu:85: akurvan vā tṛtīyādiṣv api na kurvīta /
SA15ratksanu:89: satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati na tu tenaiva /
SA15ratksanu:93: tathaiva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ sampratipatter iti na kramikāryakāritvapakṣoktadoṣāvasaraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:95: ye hi kāryam utpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣās teṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kārye 'nuvartamāneṣv api teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthād ūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
SA15ratksanu:97: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva kartāro yenāmi niṣpatter ārabhya kāryaṃ vidadhyuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:102: na ca sattvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatireko 'py ayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:103: na hi kramākramābhyām anyasya prakārasyābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:106: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇām iti na kramākramābhyām arthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:109: kiṃ ca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvam api parokṣam eveti na tāvat pratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15ratksanu:112: (80.22) api ca kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam ity atisubhāṣitam /
SA15ratksanu:113: yadi krameṇa vyāptaṃ katham akrameṇa, athākrameṇa na tarhi krameṇa /
SA15ratksanu:114: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptim iti tu bruvatā vyāpter evābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
SA15ratksanu:115: na hi bhavaty agnir dhūmabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vyāpta iti /
SA15ratksanu:117: (80.26) api ca kim idaṃ bādhakam akṣaṇikānām asattāṃ sādhayati /
SA15ratksanu:120: (80.28) na pūrvo vikalpaḥ / uktakrameṇa hetor āśrayāsiddhatvāt /
SA15ratksanu:123: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā taddhetuḥ syād iti sattvam anaikāntikam /
SA15ratksanu:125: atha sā vikalpyate tadā pūrvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:126: (81.1) ata eva na tṛtīyo 'pi vikalpaḥ / vyatirekāsiddhau sambandhāsiddheḥ /
SA15ratksanu:127: (81.2) kiṃ ca na bhūtalavad atrākṣaṇiko dharmi dṛśyate /
SA15ratksanu:128: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasya cit dṛśyasya pratipattim antareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
SA15ratksanu:131: ubhayadharmatve cānaikāntikatvam iti na trayīṃ doṣajātim atipatati /
SA15ratksanu:132: (81.6) yat punar uktam akṣaṇikatve kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāvirodhād iti /
SA15ratksanu:133: tatra virodhasiddhim anusaratā virodhy api pratipattavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:136: (81.8) pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sann eva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
SA15ratksanu:138: saṃvṛtisiddham api vāstavaṃ kālpanikaṃ vā syāt /
SA15ratksanu:143: tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ, kālpaniko vā /
SA15ratksanu:147: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjalir iti /
SA15ratksanu:150: nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayas tenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatir ataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15ratksanu:151: śūnyaṃ ca dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakṣā kramāder api /
SA15ratksanu:154: iha vastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā gavi gotvam,
SA15ratksanu:156: avastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo vandhyāputre vaktṛtvābhāvo gaganāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
SA15ratksanu:157: tatrāvastuni dharmitvaṃ nāstīti kiṃ vastudharmeṇa dharmitvaṃ nāsti /
SA15ratksanu:159: (81.27) prathamapakṣe siddhasādhanam / dvitīyapakṣe tu svavacanavirodhaḥ / yad āhur guravaḥ //
SA15ratksanu:161: dharmasya kasya cid avastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kim ihāsti no vā kvāpy asti cet katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāsty eva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:163: avastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvasya vyāpakasyābhāvād āśrayāsiddhidūṣaṇasyānupanyāsaprasaṅga ity arthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:166: paraṃ tu pratiṣidhyata iti vyaktam idam īśvaraceṣṭitam /
SA15ratksanu:167: tathā hy avastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanena dharmitvābhāvaḥ kim avastuni vidhīyata,
SA15ratksanu:169: na vā kva cid apīti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15ratksanu:173: (82.8) tṛtīyas tu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvād iti katham avastuno dharmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:174: tasmād yathā pramāṇopanyāsaḥ prameyatvasvīkāra pūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ,
SA15ratksanu:175: vācakaśabdopanyāso vā vācyasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptas tathā 'vastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:178: tad yadi vacanopanyāso vyāpyadharmas tadā 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkāro 'pi vyāpakadharmo durvāraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:180: tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balād āyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:182: na hy abruvan paraṃ bodhayitum īśaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:183: [a]bruvan vā doṣam imaṃ parihartum iti mahati saṃkaṭe praveśaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:184: (82.17) avastuprastāve sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataiva yujyate iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:186: avastuprastāve svayam eva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāyayā niḥsartum icchati /
SA15ratksanu:187: na cāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamardanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedhuṃ śakṣate /
SA15ratksanu:188: tataś cātrāpi kramākramabhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastvātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmitvaṃ kena pratiṣidhyate /
SA15ratksanu:196: svavacanasyānupanyāsaprasaṅgād ity akṣaṇikasyābhāve sandehe 'pi vā 'vastudharmeṇa dharmitvam avyāhatam iti nāyam āśrayāsiddho vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:199: kevalam asau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratītir vastvavastunor ekarūpā na bhavati /
SA15ratksanu:201: yathā pratyakṣam anumānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi ca vikalpaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:202: avastunas tu sāmarthyābhāvād vikalpamātram eva pratītiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:203: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratītir yathā sākṣāt pratyakṣam,
SA15ratksanu:207: (83.4) na hy abhāvah kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkartavyo 'pi tu vyavahartavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:208: sa ca vyavahāro vikalpād api sidhyaty eva /
SA15ratksanu:209: anyathā sarvajanaprasiddho 'vastuvyavahāro na syāt / iṣyate ca /
SA15ratksanu:211: taddharmitvapratiṣedhānubandhād ity akāmenāpi vikalpamātrasiddho 'kṣaṇikaḥ svīkartavya iti nāyam apratītatvād apy āśrayāsiddho hetur vaktavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:213: (83.9) na kaś cid dhetur anāśrayaḥ vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sulabhatvād iti /
SA15ratksanu:215: vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sambhave 'pi vastudharmeṇa dharmitvāyogāt /
SA15ratksanu:217: (83.11) yathā ātmano vibhutvasādhanārtham upanyastaṃ sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād iti sādhanam /
SA15ratksanu:220: samarthite tu hetāv avastuka iti brūmaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:227: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntasyāpi vyomotpalāder dharmitvaṃ vikalpamātreṇa pratītiś cāvagantavyā /
SA15ratksanu:228: tad evam avastudharmāpekṣayā 'vastunodharmitvasya vikalpamātreṇa pratīteś cāpahnotum aśakyatvān nāyam āśrayāsiddho hetuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:232: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇasāmarthyam asti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyam api (?) kāryaṃ kuryāt /
SA15ratksanu:236: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
SA15ratksanu:237: sahakārisahitād eva tataḥ kāryotpattidarsanāt iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:239: yadā tāvad amī militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvam eṣām astu ko niṣeddhā /
SA15ratksanu:240: militair eva tu tatkāryaṃ karttavyam iti kuto labhyate /
SA15ratksanu:243: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā naikaṃ janakam iti sthiravādināṃ manorājyasyāpy aviṣayaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:244: (83.29) kiṃ kurmo dṛśyate tāvad evam iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:245: dṛśyatāṃ kiṃ tu pūrvasthitād eva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattir anyasmād eva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇād iti vivādapadam etat /
SA15ratksanu:246: tatra prāg api sambhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattir na vā kadā cid apīti virodham asamādhāya tad eva kāryotpattir iti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpām arhati /
SA15ratksanu:249: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñādūṣaṇam asmābhiḥ sthirasiddhidūṣaṇe pratipāditam iti tad evāvadhāryam /
SA15ratksanu:252: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaraṃ,
SA15ratksanu:253: tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvam iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:255: tathāpi tat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
SA15ratksanu:256: tad yadi prāg api, prāg api kāryaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:257: atha paścād eva, na tadā sthiro bhāvaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:258: (84.11) na ca kāryaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktam, tasyāsattvāt /
SA15ratksanu:259: hetuś ca sann api yadi svakāryaṃ na karoti, tadā tatkāryam eva tan na syāt / svātantryāt /
SA15ratksanu:264: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
SA15ratksanu:266: sthirasvabhāvatve bhāvasyottarakālam evedaṃ na pūrvakālam iti kuta etat /
SA15ratksanu:267: tadabhāvāc ca kāraṇam apy uttarakāryasvabhāvam ity api kutaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:271: sthiratve 'py eṣa eva svabhāvas tasya yad uttarakṣaṇa eva kāryaṃ karotīti cet /
SA15ratksanu:272: na, pramāṇabādhite svabhāvābhyupagamāyogād iti na tāvad akṣaṇikasya kramikāryakāritvam asti /
SA15ratksanu:274: dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe kārakasvarūpasadbhāve punar api kāryakaraṇaprasaṅgāt /
SA15ratksanu:275: (84.21) kārye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvād ūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayed iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:277: sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayor api sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvam avadhāryam iti prāg eva pratipādanāt /
SA15ratksanu:278: kāryasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ kartum aśakyatvam eva kāraṇam asamartham āvedayati /
SA15ratksanu:279: (84.23) tad ayam akṣaṇike kramākramikāryakāritvābhāvo na siddhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:280: na ca kramākramābhyām aparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyām avyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15ratksanu:285: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatve 'pyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣād eva sidhyati /
SA15ratksanu:286: evaṃ kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam iti kramākramayor anyo 'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvād etat prakāradvayaparihāreṇārthākriyakāritvam anyatra na gatam ity arthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:291: na hy abhāvaḥ kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣatkartavyaḥ, api tu vikalpād eva vyavahartavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:292: na hy abhāvasya vikalpād anyāpratipattir apratipattir vā sarvathā /
SA15ratksanu:294: evaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpād eva pratipattiḥ.4 /
SA15ratksanu:296: vyāpakānupalambhena nirdoṣeṇa sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāpter avyāhatatvāt /
SA15ratksanu:298: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ ca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvād iti sthitam /
SA15ratksanu:300: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhir iti yady anupalabdhimātraṃ tadā na tasya sādhyabuddhijanakatvam avastutvāt /
SA15ratksanu:301: na cānyopalabdhir vyāpakānupalabdhir abhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivad anyasya kasya cid anupalabdher iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:304: yathā hi neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvād ity atra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir vṛkṣānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:305: śiṃśapāpeksayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir eva śiṃśapāyā abhāvopalabdhir iti svabhāvahetuparyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:306: tathā nityasya dharmiṇo vikalpabuddhyavasitasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇād eva kramikāritvākramikāritvānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:307: arthakriyāpekṣayā ca kevalapratītir evārthakriyāyoga pratītir iti vyāpakānupalambhāntarād asya na kaś cid viśeṣaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:308: (85.22) adhyavasāyāpekṣayā ca bāhye 'kṣaṇike vastuni vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddhivyavahāraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:309: adhyavasāyaś ca samanantarapratyayabalād āyātākāraviśeṣayogād agṛhīte 'pi pravartanaśaktir bodhavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:314: ayaṃ ca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmiṇi tathā 'vastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:315: (85.27) tathā hy ekajñānasaṃsargy atra vikalpya eva /
SA15ratksanu:317: śaśaśirasy api tena sahaikajñānasaṃsargitvasambhāvanayaiva śṛṅgaṃ niṣidhyate,
SA15ratksanu:318: tathā nīlādāv apariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmiṇā sārdham ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau,
SA15ratksanu:319: yadi nitye bhavataḥ nityagrāhijñāne svadharmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātām iti sambhāvanaya ekājñānasaṃsargadvārakam eva pratiṣidhyate /
SA15ratksanu:320_0: kathaṃ punar etasmin nityajñāne kramākramayor asphuraṇam iti yāvatā kramākramakroḍikṛtam
SA15ratksanu:320_1: eva nityaṃ vikalpayām iti cet. ata eva bādhakāvatāro viparītāropam antareṇa tasya vaiyarthyāt.
SA15ratksanu:322_0: kālāntare 'py ekarūpatayā nityatvam. kramākramau ca kṣaṇadvaye bhinnarūpatayā. tato
SA15ratksanu:322_1: nityatvasya kramākramikāryaśakteś ca parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā durvāro virodha
SA15ratksanu:322_2: iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayor antarbhāvaḥ. anantarbhāvāc ca suddhanityavikalpena
SA15ratksanu:322_3: dūrīkṛtakramākramasamāropeṇa katham ullekhaḥ. tataś ca pratiyogini nitye 'pi vikalpyamāne
SA15ratksanu:322_5: kramākramasyānupalabdhiḥ. tata eva cārthakriyāśakter anupalabdhiḥ. tasmād vyāpakavivekidharmyupalabdhitayā
SA15ratksanu:324: nanv etad avastudharmikopayogi vastv adhiṣṭhānatvāt pramāṇavyavasthāyā iti cet. kim idaṃ vastvadhiṣṭhānatvam nāma. kiṃ paramparayāpi vastunaḥ sakāśād āgatatvam,
SA15ratksanu:325: atha vastuni kena cid ākāreṇa vyavahārakāraṇatvam,
SA15ratksanu:328: yady ādyaḥ pakṣas tadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāś ca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastupratibaddhatvam asyāpi. na kṣīṇam.
SA15ratksanu:329: (86.18) na dvitīye 'pi pakṣe dosah sambhavati. kṣaṇabhaṅgivastu sādhanopāyatvād asya.
SA15ratksanu:331_0: na cāntimo 'pi vikalpaḥ kalpyate. tasyaiva nityavikalpasya vastuno dharmibhūtasya
SA15ratksanu:333: ayam eva nyāyo na vaktā vandhyāsutaś caitanyābhāvād ityādau yojyaḥ. etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādir antarbhāvayituṃ śakyate na tathāyam iti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:335: na ca kramādyabhāvas trayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātikrāmati, abhāvadharmatve 'pi āśrayāsiddhidoṣaparihārāt.
SA15ratksanu:337: yat tvanena pramāṇāntarān nityānām asattvasiddhau kramādivirahasyābhāvadharmatā sidhyatīty uktam,
SA15ratksanu:338_0: tadvālasyāpi durabhidhānam. nityo hi dharmi. asattvaṃ sādhyam. kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvaviraho
SA15ratksanu:338_1: hetuḥ. asya cābhāvadharmatvaṃ nāma asattvalakṣaṇasvasādhyāvinābhāvitvam ucyate. tac
SA15ratksanu:338_2: ca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisiddhau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya
SA15ratksanu:338_3: vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatīty abhāvadharmatvaṃ prāg eva vidhyor vyāptisādhanāt
SA15ratksanu:338_4: pratyakṣād anumānād ekasmād vā pramāṇāntarāt siddham iti netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:340: na ca sattāyām ivāsattāyām api tulyaḥ prasaṅgo bhinnanyāyatvāt. vastubhūtaṃ hi tatra sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca. tayor dharmy api vastv eva yujyate.
SA15ratksanu:342_0: vastunas tu pratyakṣānumānābhyām eva siddhiḥ. tayor abhāve niyamenāśrayāsiddhir iti
SA15ratksanu:342_1: yuktam. asattāsādhane tv avastudharmo hetur avastu vikalpamātrasiddhe dharmiṇi nāśrayāsiddhidoṣeṇa
SA15ratksanu:342_2: dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ. tathā 'kṣaṇikasya kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhaḥ sidhyaty eva.
SA15ratksanu:344_0: tathā vikalpādevākṣaṇiko virodhī siddhaḥ. vikalpollikhitaś cāsya svabhāvo nāpara
SA15ratksanu:344_1: ity api vyavahartavyam. anyathā tadanuvādena kramākramādirahitatvādiniṣedhādikam
SA15ratksanu:344_3: asti ca. ato yathā pramāṇābhāve 'pi vikalpasiddhasya vandhyāsutādeḥ saundaryādiniṣedho
SA15ratksanu:344_4: 'nurūpas tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇikarūpasya tad eva pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ
SA15ratksanu:344_5: kīdṛso doṣaḥ syāt. yadi cākṣaṇikānubhavābhāvāt virodhapratiṣedhas tarhi vandhyāputrādyanubhavād
SA15ratksanu:346: nanv evaṃ virodhasyāpāramārthikatvam. taddvāreṇa kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy apāramārthikī syād iti cet.
SA15ratksanu:348: na hi virodho nāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādasambandhābhidhānam iṣyate,
SA15ratksanu:349: 'smābhir upapadyate vā. yenaikasambandhino vastutvābhāve 'pāramārthikaṃ syāt. yathā tv iṣyate tathā pāramārthika eva /
SA15ratksanu:353: nāpy abhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yam anayor asaṃkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:358: nanu nityatvaṃ kramayaugapadyavattvaṃ ca viruddhau dharmau vidhūya nāparo virodho nāma,
SA15ratksanu:360: (88.2) na, na hi dharmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:362: anyathā virodhanāmadharmāntarasambhave 'pi yadi na viruddhau dharmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasambhavaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:363: viruddhau ced dharmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:366: nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayas tenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatir ataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15ratksanu:367: śūnyaś ca dvitayena sidhyati na vā 'sattā 'pi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakyā kramāder api / iti /
SA15ratksanu:369: dharmasya kasya cid avastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kim ihāsti no vā /
SA15ratksanu:370: kvāpy asti cet katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāsty eva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:371: (88.17) tad vam nityaṃ na kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvayogīti paramārthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:372: tataś ca sattāyuktam api naiveti paramārthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:373: tataś ca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvād akṣaṇikān nivartamānam idaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika eva viśrāmyatvena vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhir avirodhini /
SA15ratksanu:374: (88.21) prakṛtiḥ sarvadharmāṇaṃ yad bodhān muktir iṣyate /
